ЁЯФЪ
Last Chola Ruler

Rajendra III was the last ruler of the Chola dynasty. Although he was a capable ruler and tried to stop the Pandyas, he could not withstand the combined might of the Hoysalas and Pandyas.

ЁЯП│я╕П
Decline of the Dynasty

In 1279 CE, the Pandya king Maravarman Kulasekhara Pandyan I defeated Rajendra III in battle. With this defeat, the great Chola Empire came to an end, and their territory was merged into the Pandya empire.
